nz.name: SLEEP RADIO
nz.description: Can’t sleep? Need relaxation? Got anxiety, stress, depression or insomnia. Have a listen to us and if symptoms persist, see your health professional. Sleep Radio are the only radio station on the planet that actually WANTS you to fall asleep while listening!

nz.name: RNZ - National
nz.description: Radio New Zealand National's programme mix includes news and current affairs, documentaries and features, drama and music.

nz.name: Newstalk ZB
nz.description: Newstalk ZB Auckland is a hit radio station broadcasting from Auckland, New Zealand. It is a 24 hours live radio channel popular around this country. Official website of Newstalk ZB Auckland is

nz.name: Radio Sport
nz.description: Radio Sport is New Zealand's only 24/7 sports radio station.Live commentaries, interviews, sports news on the hour and sports talkback. Our leading journalists and broadcasters keep your eye on the ball.

nz.name: Radio ZM
nz.description: ZM (pronounced zed-em) is a New Zealand contemporary hit radio network owned by New Zealand Media and Entertainment. It broadcasts 19 markets throughout mainland New Zealand via terrestrial FM, and worldwide via the Internet.

nz.name: The Hits
nz.description: Playing All Your Favourite Hits

nz.name: Coast FM
nz.description: Coast plays the music you grew up with, and love to sing along to. It is the ultimate musical escape from the daily grind. The real personalities on Coast will tell you what’s happening today, in an easy going, uncluttered environment.

nz.name: Flava
nz.description: Flava Radio stations are the most recognized internet based, onward thinking, innovative equipment which is the reason why most of the people loves this station. nz.name: Radio Hauraki
nz.description: Hauraki Auckland is a popular radio station broadcasting from Auckland, New Zealand. It is a 24 hours live online radio station playing Rock music. This radio station is getting popularity for playing rock songs randomly

nz.name: Mix Radio
nz.description: Looking for a radio station where you know all the words?That’s us! Welcome to MixWe play nothing but the best music from the 80’s and 90’s.Artists like Madonna, Prince, Michael Jackson, U2, Crowded House, INXS, Robbie Williams, and George Michael alongside gems that we guarantee you won’t have heard on the radio for a very long time. Treat your ears to Mix – we love the 80’s and 90’s!

nz.name: Sweet Sounz
nz.description: Sweet Sounz FM is not popular for only playing reggae music but because its a complete package of entertainment which is a core attraction of Sweet Sounz FM Like every other online radio medium they are also visioned to be one of the most popular one in New Zealand To be one of the most popular radio in their field Sweet Sounz FM always tries to bring some listener preferred songs in their daily music charts.

nz.name: More FM
nz.description: MORE FM is a New Zealand radio network playing adult contemporary music or Pop music. It is operated by MediaWorks New Zealand.

nz.name: The Sound
nz.description: The Sound is a New Zealand radio station playing the Soundtrack Of Our Lives.From The Beatles to The Rolling Stones, Fleetwood Mac to Queen, The Eagles to David Bowie and U2 – the playlist gives you more of what you want: Less talk and more of the best music of a generation, with all the news and information you need to get through your day.

nz.name: The Edge
nz.description: The Edge is New Zealand's #1 radio station… and we play All The Hits!

nz.name: TAB Trackside Radio
nz.description: Trackside Radio is our national radio network broadcasting racing, racing news, sports news, talk and information. Coverage starts from 6am every day.

nz.name: Mai FM
nz.description: We play nothing but the hottest Hip Hop and RnB, we've got your access to the hottest concerts and events and we’re home to the best DJs in Aotearoa! So tune in on your radio, The Mai FM App or online and get amongst what’s going down.

nz.name: Life FM
nz.description: New Zealand's Christian radio network features music, programs, and discussion. A member of the Rhema Broadcasting Group.

nz.name: Groove FM
nz.description: Groove is New Zealand's only Cafe Style Jazz Radio Station. Also the only locally owned & operated, independent commercial radio station in Wellington. We specialise in Lounge, Swing, Classic Jazz, Blues, Acid Jazz, Funk, Soul and anything with a Groove.

nz.name: Spellbound Radio
nz.description: Spellbound Harbour Radio welcome all of you to the house of entertainment that has been designed to give you the best radio experience no matter whether you are living in New Zealand or anywhere else in the world.

nz.name: RadioLIVE
nz.description: RadioLIVE delivers a new style of fresh and innovative talk radio, with the latest news and comment.

nz.name: Niu FM
nz.description: The Pacific Media Network is a New Zealand radio network and pan-Pasifika national broadcasting network owned and operated by the National Pacific Radio Trust. Its Niu FM radio network, Pacific Radio News Service and Auckland-based Radio 531pi station combined are accessible to an estimated 92 percent of the country's Pacific population.

nz.name: Rhema Radio
nz.description: New Zealand based Christian radio station. It's all about music and talk that really matter.

nz.name: ZFM Non-Stop
nz.description: Hits, hits and more hits! ZFM was the first station we impacted out to the world, totally advertisement free! – It is our lead station which has a basic saying; If its new, we’re playing it!

nz.name: The Breeze FM
nz.description: The Breeze is a group of New Zealand adult contemporary radio stations owned by RadioWorks, a MediaWorks New Zealand company. The Breeze plays music from the 1960s to the present day, aimed at a 35- to 54-year-old female audience.[1] There are 18 stations currently broadcasting throughout New Zealand, with each station presenting a mixture of local and network shows.

nz.name: Radio Dunedin
nz.description: The station is aimed primarily at the 40+ age bracket, with a community focus, local news, and playing music primarily from the 1960s to 1980s. It is rated number one for share of commercial radio listening in Dunedin in the Radio Audience Measurement Survey

nz.name: Radio Control
nz.description: Format of the station is very original and versatile. The playlist of the radio is also very rich in various kinds of progressive rock music in which this radio is special in. Many lovers of progressive rock music of the country loves to be with Radio Control 99.4 FM radio all day long.

nz.name: Star FM
nz.description: Star offers a unique ‘easy listening’ experience with a blend of contemporary praise and worship, classic favourites and hymns. It’s the Christian music you’ve loved for years.

nz.name: Hokonui Radio
nz.description: Home of The Country with Jamie MacKay. Playing one great song after another.

nz.name: Coast Access
nz.description: Coast FM Auckland is a hit radio station in New Zealand. This radio station is broadcasting from Auckland, New Zealand and playing oldies. It is a 24 hours live online radio station, popular among the people of New Zealand.

nz.name: 95b FM
nz.description: 95b FM is aimed to be the leader and broadcaster of contemporary music for the mass amount of listeners. 95b FM alos consults with their listeners and even with students for the developing process of their radio station. The radio interacts with students and takes their opinion because the core of the radio is connected with students and their interest.

nz.name: The Country
nz.description: It began in 1994 as a five minute rural feature on an independently owned Southland radio station. Today it has grown to an hour, become an integral part of the farming day and can be heard throughout the country on Newstalk ZB, Radio Sport, Hokonui and affiliates. It's your agribusiness lunch hour with a generous side-serving of news, sport and politics. You can also go from on-farm to on-line at thecountry.co.nz

nz.name: The Flea FM
nz.description: Radio The Flea is broadcasting from Auckland, New Zealand. This is a famous radio channel in New Zealand. It is a 24 hours live online radio station playing various popular songs around the clock.

nz.name: Radio 531pi
nz.description: Since 1993 Radio 531pi has been serving our Pacific communities a mix of news, views, information and talk back all blended with a music mix you'll hear nowhere else.

nz.name: Just Jazz NZ
nz.description: Just Jazz plays  jazz in all its genres; jazz, jazz funk, blues, trad jazz, smooth jazz…We are open to all kinds of jazz. We love jazz.

nz.name: FLEET FM
nz.description: Fleet FM is a low-power non-commercial co-operative radio station which has previously broadcast permanently in Auckland and Wellington, New Zealand. It broadcast in Auckland on 88.3FM and in Wellington on 107.3FM. It was founded on 18 July 2003.The station was unique in that it is being run as a completely voluntary project and is advert free. This helps to ensure the Fleet disk jockey complete artistic control. The station's listenership crosses through traditional Auckland demographics reaching a diverse audience particularly those involved in the Arts and creative industries.Fleet has held a variety of music and art related events, such as the infamous 'Convoy' gigs and Camp Fleet, when on New Years the radio station takes over a classic Kiwi school camp. Fleet members are often exhibiting art about town and sometimes in conjunction with the Pelvic Trust.

nz.name: Retro Hit Radio
nz.description: We're a radio station from Auckland, NewZealand playing #80s and #90s retro hits that Rocked The Block!

nz.name: RAG-FM 107.7 Raglan New Zealand
nz.description: RAG-FM “ Top Music Top of the Dial ” is a LPFM radio station broadcasting on the westerly air waves,Snuggled in the heart of Raglan on the West Coast of the North Island in New Zealand.

nz.name: RDU FM
nz.description: Rolling since 1976, RDU98.5fm is now the only bastion of alternative radio in Christchurch.RDU 98.5 FM is the people’s Choice online radio and fm radio station. They are Playing Soul, Funk, Jazz, Electronic, Blues and World music. They give you sounds like no-one else can. RDU 98.5 FM broadcasts to the greater New Zealand area and beyond. RDU 98.5 FM provide the best of specialist music, community and arts programs.

nz.name: Radio One
nz.description: Radio One 91fm is your radio station, home of the intrepid audiophile. The southern sister of the bNets is on campus on Level 1 above the OUSA archway.We take you to the school and bank your cheque with all the freshest music, the latest news, and the skinny on the places to be.

nz.name: Radio Active
nz.description: Radio Active is an alternative radio station broadcasting in Wellington, New Zealand on 88.6FM (formally 89 FM) as well as www.radioactive.fm.

nz.name: Sunshine FM
nz.description: Nestled in the heart of Kaitaia is SUNSHINE 104.3 FM, a busy local radio station that serves the Far North of New Zealand and covers from north of Mangamuka to Cape Reinga, and across to Mangonui on the east coast. Sunshine FM have a friendly, professional and commercial approach to broadcasting. Since first going to air in February 1998, we have received great support from the local business community, local service clubs, emergency services and of course our listeners. The audience ranges in age from about 30 to 50 years or anyone who likes ‘Classic Hits from the 60’s to today’. Broadcasting goes 24 hours, Monday to Sunday, with News, sport and weather provided every hour on the hour. Sunshine also promotes Māori language and customs to the wider community, and this adds a significant cultural dynamic to our product. The advertising content has a community specific focus. How can you can be involved? You are welcome to participate or send us feedback about any of our music, promotions or events. If you’re keen to be on the radio, please get in touch as we’re always looking for volunteers to be part of our vibrant team.

nz.name: East FM
nz.description: East FM is a community radio station broadcasting on 88.1fm in and around Howick, and on 107.1fm in Botany/FlatBush areas.

nz.name: Tai FM
nz.description: Tai FM has a youth focus playing R'n'B, Hip Hop, Reggae and the best of the Old Skool. Tune in when your’e in Kaitaia, on 106.7FM. Otherwise tune in online and listen from anywhere in the world. Tune in with Riah on the Drive Time Show as she has some awesome prizes up for GRABS!!!Yes thats right...thanks to Ami Holifield we have 3 Double Passes to the Opononi Gig being held on the 8th of January 2016 featuring Katchafire | Sons of Zion | The Black Seeds | Ladi6 | Kora also we have tees and a major prize pack filled with all the bands merchandise, cds, tees and more but you got to tune in to win

nz.name: SKI FM
nz.description: From Taihape to Taupo and beyond! 24/7 the Ski FM Network plays the hottest hit music all year round. We are a contemporary hit radio station and reach 71,200 local population in the central North Island region and a further potential 2.3 million listeners a year, who travel along the busy State Highways (including the Desert Road)

nz.name: Most FM
nz.description: The Most 100.4 FM is a hit radio station broadcasting from New Plymouth, New Zealand. It is a 24 hours live online radio channel playing Top 40/Pop, Alternative Rock etc genres of music throughout the day.

nz.name: Gaia FM
nz.description: Gaia FM can be received in most parts of Tauranga and Mt. Maunganui on 87.8Mhz or 107.1Mhz FM, however, being low power, an aerial of some kind will be required in most areas. A piece of wire roughly 2 metres in length connected to the 300ohm connection on your home stereo is often sufficient. 300ohm indoor ribbon antennas can usually be purchased from electronic supply stores.

nz.name: Big River
nz.description: BIG RIVER FM is a community-owned and run radio station based in Dargaville, Northland, New Zealand.The station transmits throughout parts of the Kaipara region on 98.6 MHz FM and in Ruawai and Aranga on 88.2 MHz FM.

nz.name: Bollybop
nz.description: bollybop is Tauranga's first and only 24/7 Indian Radio Station, playing the latest Bollywood, Hindi and Punjabi Hits.

nz.name: World FM
nz.description: World FM is a low power FM (LPFM) radio station based in Tawa, Wellington, New Zealand.Our aim is to play a mix of some of the best world music, Kiwi classics, and a selection of radio programming from around the world.

nz.name: Radio Samoa
nz.description: Radio Samoa in its 16th year of service to the Samoan community and is enjoying a close working relationship with its clients and has the full support of the community it serves. It has built a strong relationship with the community through integrity and delivering quality programs to enhance the status of the Samoan Community not only in New Zealand but globally through its website streaming. In its philosophy “a well informed community is an empowered community”

nz.name: Access Manawatu
nz.description: Providing community broadcasting opportunities, facilities, support and training to individuals and organisations, to create programmes that reflect their views and values.

nz.name: Plains FM
nz.description: PLAINS FM 96.9 airs audio content by, for and about Cantabrians - our interests, concerns and passions. This model of citizen-made media provides a democratic voice for our region.

nz.name: Planet FM
nz.description: Planet FM is a not-for-profit community based radio station. We offer a radio broadcast facility to community groups and individuals who otherwise have little or no access to the airwaves.

nz.name: Radio Kidnappers
nz.description: Radio Kidnappers 1431 AM 104.7 FM Hastings, Community radio. Hastings, New Zealand. Radio Kidnappers is Radio Station based in Hastings that covers Entertainment and News & Current Affairs .

nz.name: Te Hiku Radio
nz.description: Te Hiku 97.1 FM is part of the iwi communities of Te Hiku o Te Ika/the Far North, and belongs collectively to it’s five iwi. Te Hiku FM and was born out of the dreams and aspirations of our kuia and kaumātua (elders), as a way to retain Māori language communication within our whānau, hapu and iwi. The iwi radio format is packed with local news, interactive talkback and Waiata in Te Reo Māori. The station promotes the use of Te Reo Māori as a means of everyday communication, and whilst targeted at native speakers, listening to the station is a great way to improve Te Reo Māori for beginners, and second language learners. How do you get involved? Te Hiku FM is always keen to hear your views and encourages listeners to contribute to topical discussion. If you have a panui to share with the iwi or a kaupapa that you would like to talk about then please contact Maria Tauroa.

nz.name: The Cheese
nz.description: Playing hits of the 80s, 90s and Today! We are a low power FM radio station broadcasting from central Lower Hutt. You can listen in to us on 87.9FM or tune in via the internet or Cable TV.We celebrated 5 years on air July 2011. Help us celebrate, become a friend!

nz.name: Humm FM
nz.description: Humm Fm is an Auckland based FM radio station. It's an upbeat, modern and fast tracked music station, that plays the music for the today's generation... We are humming the new tune.

nz.name: Static FM
nz.description: Static 88.1fm is AUT’s understudy radio station, run by the 34 year three understudies of the Bachelor of Communication Studies majoring in radio. The understudies are included in the regular operation of the radio station, including dealing with the station, adding to the play rundown, composition and delivering all components of on-air substance furthermore advancing the station.

nz.name: Radio Southland

nz.name: Bitter Sweet Music NZ
nz.description: Bitter Sweet Music broadcasts music that are packed with the noted taste of music to give listeners a kind of listening experience only few can match.Bitter Sweet Music its a bit bit botter and a bit sweet...

The original pirate broadcaster on the Low Power FM Band, George FM was nurtured through it's infant years by a team of passionate volunteers, who helped shape and form it into the full featured radio station we have evolved into today.

nz.name: The Heat

nz.name: Dave FM
nz.description: Dave FM is the home of your Classic Hits Collection! Our format of uninterrupted Classic Hits from the 70's, 80’s and 90's means we’re a great place to escape with music you love without being interrupted by waffling DJ's, commercials or long news bulletins! We're not-for-profit (we do it for the love of it!) and we're based in New Zealand. We LOVE hearing from our listeners. If you'd like to get in touch, drop us a line! studio@davefm.net

nz.name: The Generator FM
nz.description: It's Rock You Live On

nz.name: Turanga FM
nz.description: Te Reo Irirangi o Turanganui-a-kiwa or Turanga FM is the Iwi Radio Station for the Gisborne Area Broadcasting on 91.7FM / 95.7FM & 98.1FM. The Station has a wide & diverse music format catering to the listening tastes of many while still maintaining its prime mission statement of preserving & promoting the maori culture & language.

nz.name: Channel Z
nz.description: New Zealand’s favourite alternative and modern rock station.

nz.name: Base FM
nz.description: Base FM 107.3 is broadcasting from Auckland, New Zealand. This radio station is playing Electic, Funk, Hip Hop etc genres of music 24 hours live online.  It is now getting much popularity among the young generation in New Zealand

nz.name: Moana Radio
nz.description: Moana Radio broadcasts from Tauranga on two frequencies, 98.2FM and 1440AM. This allows us to reach an audience from Katikati to Opotiki on 1440AM, and from Katikati to Pukehina on 98.2FM. We also have an international audience via online streaming at  www.moanaradio.co.nz. This allows our expatriate Tauranga whanau to stay in touch with their community, wherever they are in world.

nz.name: AndHow.FM
nz.description: An independent, world-class, always eclectic, indie, alternative, modern, retro/vintage rock & more FM and internet radio station. Jamming the free world, one person at a time since 1998.

nz.name: Switch FM Gisborne
nz.description: Gisbornes locally owned and operated FM radio station Switch FM playing a random mix of music genres.

nz.name: New Zealand Net Radio
nz.description: All about the Music!Based in Whangarei, Northland in New Zealand we enjoy playing a range of our favourite pop and rock, mostly from the 80s until today but with a few classic gold tracks mixed in. We hope you enjoy our blend, streaming ad free 24/7 through New Zealand.

nz.name: Radio Ngāti Porou
nz.description: Radio Ngati Porou covers an area that has a population of nearly 44 thousand people, around 20 thousand being of Maori Heritage.

nz.description: To Empower The Voice of Hauraki and Hear it in all its beauty throughout all of its Tribal Regions.here to broadcast out loud and Proud of New Zealand’s number one community – Paeroa. You can rely on Nga Iwi FM

nz.name: Sun FM
nz.description: Sun FM 106.5 FM is  a local community radio station based in Whakatane, and broadcasts from its studios in Louvain Street out to the Bay of Plenty region.Profile – We play hits from the 90’s to today, keeping the entertainment up and the ads down, with the flavour distinctively local… it’s a formula you won’t find anywhere else.

nz.name: SANZLive Radio
nz.description: South Africa NZ live Radio is a Not For Profit organization we broadcasts every day from Auckland, New Zealand .We are all South African expats.Our show reflects our passion for our music our food and our culture. We also promote upcoming artist, Radio with a distinctive South Africa Flavourand promote fund raising events of NOT FOR PROFIT and CHARITY organizations

nz.name: Radio Waatea
nz.description: Radio Waatea is Aucklands’ only Māori radio station that provides an extensive bi-lingual broadcast to its listeners. Based at Nga Whare Waatea marae in Mangere, it is located in the middle of the biggest Maori population in Aotearoa.

nz.name: 100.3 FM South Canterbury
nz.description: Playing the music anthems of the 70's, 80’s, 90's, 2000's and now.We are an independent radio station located in Central Timaru, in the heart of the South Canterbury region of New Zealand’s South Island.

nz.name: AWA FM
nz.description: Started in 1991 to promote the Maori language in the Whanganui dialect to the whole Whanganui Region, from the mountains in the Central Plateau to the sea through Whanganui City.

nz.name: Kia Ora
nz.description: Kia Ora FM 89.8 was established on 10 July 1992 as part of the National Governments policies to contribute to the preservation of our Te Reo me ona Tikanga. Kia Ora FM 89.8 is owned and operated by Tanenuiarangi Manawatu Incorporated, the Iwi Authority for Rangitaane O Manawatu.

nz.name: Tuwharetoa FM
nz.description: Tuwharetoa FM broadcasts a diverse range of locally and nationally produced programs, both music and spoken word, in hi-fi stereo. Tuwharetoa FM broadcasters believe in providing real music variety, so listeners can enjoy a vast catalogue of known and unknown tracks.

nz.name: Maranui FM
nz.description: Maranui FM is a broadcast radio station in Wellington, New Zealand, providing School news and information, as well as local Indie music and sports events from Lyall Bay School.

nz.name: MFM Radio
nz.description: Te Reo Irirangi o Maniapoto (MFM) is one of 21 Iwi Radio Satations who broadcast independently throughout Aotearoa on frequencies which are specifically reserved for the promotion of the Maori language and culture. From humble beginnings in a small room along Te Kumi Road, Te Kūiti, we have a rich heritage dating back 25 years. At MFM our work ethic embraces and upholds our well known slogan, 'whanake ake', which means to develop and prosper.

nz.name: Power Hit FM 87.8
nz.description: Less talk, more music – playing all the hits, all the time.

nz.name: TumekeFM
nz.description: Te Reo Irirangi o Te Manuka Tutahi Trust, trading as The Sun on 96.9 and 106.5 FM is based in Whakatane, and broadcasts from its studios in Louvain Street out to the Bay of Plenty region.

nz.name: Radio Tautoko
nz.description: Te Reo Takiwa o Tautoko was an aggregate exertion of Iwi, from nearby hapu and whanau, to set up a Radio Station as a method for offering voice to the general population inside of the Hokianga and encompassing groups and as a guarantee to the restoration of Te Reo me ona Tikanga.Built up in 1983 Te Whare Awhina o te Iwi Community Trust turned into the spine to the goals of the nearby Iwi.

nz.name: Ngāti Hine FM
nz.description: Ngati Hine FM falls under the umbrella of the Ngati Hine wellbeing trust and was set up to serve for our kin of Ngati Hine and the more prominent tribe of Ngapuhi.

nz.name: Atiawa Toa FM
nz.description: Atiawa Toa FM is one of New Zealand's premier Iwi radio stations. It's a department of Te Runanganui o Taranaki Whanui and this year celebrated its 16th birthday. A fully commercial enterprise, it successfully competes in the Greater Wellington market, broadcasting to the Wellington region via 2 transmitters; one on the eastern hills of Lower Hutt and the other overlooking Porirua city.

nz.name: Te Korimako o Taranaki
nz.description: Te Korimako o Taranaki 94.8 FM – your tribal heartbeat.Te Korimako o Taranaki 94.8 FM are situated in New Plymouth and are the Taranaki Region’s select Home for Te Reo Maori, Tikanga Māori and Kaupapa Māori reporting in real time influxes of Taranaki.Te Korimako o Taranaki 94.8 FM sort incorporates Reggae, Hip Hop, R’n’B, Old and New School Jams to take into account everybo.

nz.name: The ONE - Jesus Radio
nz.description: No ads. No DJs. Just the Gospel - Everyday!

nz.name: Te Upoko o te Ika Radio

Te Upoko o te Ika Radio broadcast various kind of latest pop, rock, classic, talk, culture, dance, electronic etc. Te Upoko o te Ika Radio streaming music and programs both in online. Te Upoko o te Ika Radio is 24 hour 7 day live Online radio.

nz.name: Radio Kahungunu
nz.description: Mission:  To operate a Māori radio broadcasting service that will fulfil the Vision

nz.name: Tahu FM
nz.description: We play all kinds of good music... From Maori to other Indigenous SoundsFrom Reggae to Electronic.From NZ Roots to World Music.From Motown Soul to Neo-Soul and BluesFrom Urban/RnB to Pop and Dance.

nz.name: Radio Tama-Ohi
nz.description: Radio Tama-Ohi is a Tongan Community Radio Station fully installed, owned and operated 24/7 by Tongans under the Tama-Ohi Charitable Trust.

nz.name: AM936 Radio
nz.description: AM936是紐西蘭唯一全部以普通話廣播的中文電台，是中華電視網華人之聲廣播電臺於2004年建立於奧克蘭。它也是一個每日24小時，每週七天，不停廣播的中文電台頻道。本電台積極，熱情，高質量地為廣大的15萬華人朋友服務。本頻道面向社會各階層，不同年齡，不同職業，不同生活背景，不同興趣愛好著，都是我們的聽眾。本頻道的節目編排根據聽眾的愛好和商家的需求而設定。AM936轉播來自中國北京最受歡迎的北京人民廣播電台，中國最有權威和影響力的中央人民廣播電台的新聞，台灣深受聽眾肯定歡迎的飛碟電台節目。每週更自製高達 70小時以上的本地節目。“我愛紐西蘭”，“新聞今日談”，及時反映奧克蘭動態直接播報，並且與中華電視網的免費中文電視 CTV8聯播，首開紀元，節目中Call-in單元與所有觀眾聽眾互動。紐西蘭的主流社會亦透過 AM936及CTV8和華社互相交流，互通訊息，豐富了紐西蘭人的文化及華人的生活，弘揚中華文化，本電台還開設了各類文化，法律，教育，音樂，投資，移民，留學，財經，文化，娛樂，旅遊，新聞等欄目，新穎，超卓，非凡是本頻道的特色。AM936透過 SKYTV的衛星平台及istars.me的網站線上即時收聽，收聽範圍覆蓋整個紐西蘭，成為紐西蘭全國收聽率最高，影響力最大的中文廣播電台。

nz.name: Radio Tainui
nz.description: Radio Tainui is an international online radio station playing a fresh, uplifting and eclectic music format for a global audience. Radio Tainui are an independent station for the online generation, connecting those who already have a strong connection with New Zealand.

nz.name: KFM
nz.description: Kfm 106.9 has been broadcasting a quality sound for a discerning ear for the last twelve years. We are a low frequency station which promotes social consciousness and genres not championed by our mainstream counterparts.

nz.name: Pirate Radio
nz.description: Electro , Techno , Drum and Bass , Trance , House on the Pirate Radio

nz.name: Raukawa FM
nz.description: We are an Iwi Radio Station located in the South Waikato Area here in the heart of Tokoroa.Also Know as 'Tok (pronounced toke) Town'Emare-Rose Nikora (right) temporarily stepped out of Kohanga in 1990 to establish the Raukawa Trustboard and went on to establish the Raukawa Radio Station in 1990. Te Reo Irirangi O Ngati Raukawa began broadcasting on 23 of October 1990, with keen motivated people that were determind on making this a radio station that people would want to listen, learn and contribute to.

nz.name: Twisted Radio
nz.description: No ads. No bullshit. Just great tunes.We are an internet based radio station. We have been broadcasting since May 2004. We play an eclectic mix of music. Bring the noise!

nz.name: Kaos FM NZ
nz.description: KAOS FM NZ. Radio That Rocks. Active Rock. Classic Rock. Kiwi Rock. International Rock. Streaming 24/7. Listen Now online or Download our App from Google Play.

nz.name: GuruBox Radio
nz.description: This radio station about Yoga and Meditation in Hindi Language. This include talks and meditation music.

nz.name: Tamil Panpalai ANZ
nz.description: Special Broadcast for Australia and New Zealand Tamils.
